education.area: Double Majors in Computer Science and Informatics

research.name: Information and Computer Sciences Honor Program
research.institute: Individual Researcher, (SEPE) Research Group, UC Irvine
summary: - Developed an explainable machine learning model under Dr. Mohammad Moshirpour's guidance to predict hypertension risks by analyzing key health and sleep data indicators using feature selection techniques.
- Achieved groundbreaking insights by improving overall accuracy in prediction accuracy for hypertension risks to 89% by correlating sleep patterns, thereby enhancing non-invasive assessments.

research.name: Research Assistant
research.institute: Ren Lab - The Chinese University of Hong Kong
summary: - Contributed to the project by optimizing data analysis processes, resulting in improved model accuracy under Prof. Ren Hongliang's guidance.
- Collaborated with PhD students, refining models which led to significant advancements in the project's analytical capabilities.

research.name: Research Assistant
research.institute: Shi Lab - University of California, Irvine
summary: - Developed Python algorithms for "GO3D - Spatial Organization of Single-Cell Multiomic Data," enhancing automation and imaging accuracy.
- Innovated in automated microscopy and super-resolution imaging techniques, significantly advancing the project's technological aspect.

work.name: Beluga Subtitle Group
summary: - Founded and led a team of 130, producing 40 videos per week, achieving over 100K fans.
- Collaborated with leading digital sector clients to enhance brand visibility and engagement.

work.name: HD Education
summary: - Developed and delivered an advanced Python course on libraries such as Path and Tkinter, successfully instructing over 20 students and enhancing their coding proficiency.
- Provided customized support to diverse student groups, significantly improving their understanding and application of Python programming principles.

awards.title: ICS Honor Program (In Progress)
